meanings.definition: A sudden breaking off or interruption.
meanings.sent1: The abruption of the meeting surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: The abruption in the music caught us off guard.
meanings.sent3: The abruption in the movie made the audience gasp.
meanings.sent4: The abruption in the storm left a trail of destruction.
meanings.sent5: The abruption of the glass was loud and startling.

meanings.definition: The act of tearing or separating.
meanings.sent1: The abruption of the paper was accidental.
meanings.sent2: The abruption of the fabric was visible.
meanings.sent3: The abruption of the cake caused laughter at the party.
meanings.sent4: The abruption of the relationship was painful.
meanings.sent5: The abruption of the rope was sudden and unexpected.
